definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: II. [[שׂרק]] (cf. Nh [[סָרָק]] light red; [[הִשְׂרִיק]] Ecclus:Sir 50:7, Sir 43:9 marg. shine brightly (of sun); As. šarḳu, red blood; Ar. 4araqa rise and shine (of sun), shew redness, 4ariqa become red (like blood); Sab. [[שרק]] rise (of sun), [[משרק]] East, [[שרקן]] epith. dei the shining Sab. Denkm.:18, 4 Fell:ZMG iiv (1900), 253 f. cf. Hom:Chr 124).
